submission:
from typing import List
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        num = 0
        i = 0
        j = 1
        n = len(colors)
        while j < n+k and i < n:
            tempJ = j
            temp = tempJ % n
            while colors[temp]!= colors[(temp-1+n) % n] and tempJ < n+k-1:
                tempJ += 1
                temp = tempJ % n
            num += max(tempJ-i-k+1, 0)
            i = tempJ
            j = i+1
        return num
